SimulationListener Class Reference

#include <simulation_listener.h>

Inheritance diagram for SimulationListener:

List of all members.

Public Member Functions

virtual void update (const WorldInformation &world_information, boost::shared_ptr< Event > last_event)=0

Detailed Description

SimulationListener is an interface to be implemented by classes which wish to be informed of handled events.

Definition at line 20 of file simulation_listener.h.

Member Function Documentation

virtual void SimulationListener::update ( const WorldInformation &  world_information,
boost::shared_ptr< Event >  last_event 
) [pure virtual]

updates the listener after a event has happened. World_information is guaranteed to be a pointer to the most recently generated WorldInformation object. It is not guaranteed that last_event is a handle_request event and that world_information was generated for last_event.

Parameters:
A constant reference to the newest world information
The last handled event

Implemented in AsynchronousASG, and SynchronousASG.
